verbose_text: The biological importance of these alternative pathways has been demonstrated by studies showing that Stat2 -/- or Irf9 -/- mice were more resistant to certain viral infections than Stat1 -/- mice and that STAT1 independent transcription of some ISGs can be driven by STAT2 or IRF9.
evidence: STAT1-independent transcription of some ISGs can be driven by STAT2 or IRF9
